thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: KENNETH BAYLOR
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by KENNETH BAYLOR

author: KENNETH BAYLOR
title: KENNETH BAYLOR
text:
One Stop Shopping ,have everything I needed I ordered the RolandV3-EX VIDEO MIXER and it shipped and delivered the next day. what more can you ask for. Other companies not to say, ship and it take anywhere from
one to two weeks. This why I choose B & H for the speedy delivery. shipping is so fast I decided to order two Large Tripod carry cases.
For those that hate for your merchandice to be late shop B & H.
